description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Skillful](https://skillful-docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Keybinding JSON Format

---


This is the format of a JSON file describing a keybinding. They need to be placed inside the `keybinds` folder within your namespace. Keybinds are used to activate active power types, and toggles.

---

### Example

```json
{
    "key": "key.keyboard.h",
    "category": "key.category.test_category"
}
```
This example keybind will create a keybind bound to the "h" key, in the category called `key.category.test_category`.
markdownDescription:
### ⚠️ Requires [Skillful](https://skillful-docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Keybinding JSON Format

---


This is the format of a JSON file describing a keybinding. They need to be placed inside the `keybinds` folder within your namespace. Keybinds are used to activate active power types, and toggles.

---

### Example

```json
{
    "key": "key.keyboard.h",
    "category": "key.category.test_category"
}
```
This example keybind will create a keybind bound to the "h" key, in the category called `key.category.test_category`.

key.description: A string that defines what key this binding will use.
key.markdownDescription: A string that defines what key this binding will use.

category.description: The category this key will fall under.
category.markdownDescription: The category this key will fall under.
